name: Little Garden in the City
description:
"This garden really is a special place..."

Put down new roots and become part of a close-knit community in this meditative gardening sim.

Nestled away in the centre of a bustling seafront city, Gold Street Community Garden had long been the heart of the neighbourhood. But in recent years things haven't been quite so rosy.

As a newcomer to the garden, you have the opportunity to reinvigorate and revitalise this community cornerstone. Help out your neighbours, grow a variety of plants, and support those around you to flourish and bloom.

In this demo you can: 

  • Explore the whole garden, rendered in cosy 3D graphics 
  • Plant and water basic crops in the garden 
  • Uncover the early stirrings of your neighbours' stories
  • Chill out and listen to relaxing music
  • W A S D or arrow directional keys: move around
  • E: Interact
  • Number Keys: toggle between your tool and seeds to plant
    • 1 → watering can
    • 2 → tomato
    • 3 → corn
    • 4 → strawberry
    • 5 → cucumber
    • 6 → butternut squash
    • 7 → broccoli
    • 8 → lettuce
    • 9 → yellow bell pepper
    • 0 → green beans
  • P or ESC: pause the game
  • Left mouse click: press buttons

Caiden Boulton - QA, Developer, & Level Design 

Dylan Gallup - Creative Lead, Technical Director, & Animator

Emma Overmyer - 3D Artist & Modeler 

George Larkwright  - Game & Narrative Designer 

Johnny Garza - Development Assistant 

Luna Elvira - Production Assistant & UI/UX Designer

Sara Witsch -  Executive Producer, Composer, Technical Sound, & Sound Designer 

Tatiana Correa - Concept, 2D, & UI Artist

Thanks for playing our demo! If you'd like to submit playtesting feedback, please fill out our survey here.

  1. Click the Google Drive link above & Download the folder "LittleGardenIntheCity.zip" 
  2. Unzip the folder
  3. Find Unreal Engine file titled "CommunityGarden" 
  4. Click file to launch
  5. Play!
